name: sweet-shop
description: Sweet Shop Management System - A full-stack TDD kata

scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter api test && pnpm --filter web test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter shared lint && pnpm --filter api lint && pnpm --filter web lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter shared lint:fix && pnpm --filter api lint:fix && pnpm --filter web lint:fix
